bdy.p: Founded in 2001, Blue Sky Network provides global satellite tracking, communication, and management solutions for aviation1 , land mobile, and marine assets 2. With its asset management web portal, SkyRouter, Blue Sky Network is able to link enterprises to personnel and allow for asset tracking over the Iridium Satellite network.

reflist.entry: "VIH Helicopters Adds State-of-the-Art Flight Tracking System", "Helicopters Magazine", April 21 2008.
